Package models.operations

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Operation
    Abstract class to represent the operations that the solver can use to solve the KenKen
    OperationAddition
    OperationAddition class is a class that extends Operation class and implements the abstract methods of the Operation class.
    OperationDivision
    OperationDivision class is a class that extends OperationLimitedOperands class and implements the calculate and isValidCandidate methods This class is used to represent the division operation
    OperationEquality
    OperationEquality is a class that extends OperationLimitedOperands and implements the methods isValidCandidate and calculate.
    OperationFactory
    Factory class for creating operations for KenKen puzzles.
    OperationGCD
    OperationGCD class is a class that extends Operation class and implements the GCD operation
    OperationLCM
    OperationLCM class is a class that extends Operation class and implements the LCM operation
    OperationLimitedOperands
    Class that represents an operation with a limited number of operands
    OperationMultiplication
    OperationMultiplication class is a class that extends Operation class and implements the methods of the abstract class.
    OperationPower
    OperationPower class is used to solve the power operation (big^small)
    OperationSubtraction
    OperationSubtraction class is used to represent the subtraction operation in the KenKen puzzle
